text:
Looking at the Real Decreto 462/2002, de 24 de mayo, sobre indemnizaciones por raz√≥n del servicio, I need to identify the correct duration limits for service commissions (comisiones de servicio) with right to compensation.

According to Article 9 of this Royal Decree, which establishes the duration of service commissions:

The regulation states that, except in exceptional cases, service commissions shall not last more than **one month in national territory** and **six months abroad**, with the possibility of reasonably proposing an extension for the strictly necessary time.

This matches option A exactly.

{"answer": "A", "reasoning": "Article 9 of RD 462/2002 establishes that service commissions, except in exceptional cases, shall not exceed one month in national territory and six months abroad, with the possibility of proposing a reasoned extension for the strictly necessary time."}
